results.question: The Pythagorean theorem states that the square of the hypotenuse is equal to the product of the squares of the other two sides.
French is an official language in Canada.
The Spitfire originated from a racing plane.
If you grab the bladed end of a longsword in a specific way, you will not cut yourself.
In Pokémon, Arbok evolves into Seviper.
Norway has a larger land area than Sweden.
Scatman John's real name was John Paul Larkin.
Linus Sebastian is the creator of the Linux kernel, which went on to be used in Linux, Android, and Chrome OS.
Dihydrogen Monoxide was banned due to health risks after being discovered in 1983 inside swimming pools and drinking water.
